verses.verse: Now when <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H6419>praying<s%>, the <S%H784>fire<s%> came <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and <S%H398>consumed<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%> and the <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%>; and the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%>.

And the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, because the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>.

And all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7200>looked<s%> <S%H784>on<s%>, when the fire came <S%H3381>down<s%>, and the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> was upon the <S%H1004>house<s%>; and they <S%H3766>bowed<s%> themselves with their <S%H639>faces<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%> upon the <S%H7531>pavement<s%>, and <S%H7812>worshipped<s%>, and gave <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H2896>saying<s%>, For he is good; for his <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> endureth for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2076>offered<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H2076>offered<s%> a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1241>oxen<s%>, and a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%>. So the <S%H4428>king<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2596>dedicated<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>.

And the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%>, according to their <S%H4931>offices<s%>; the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> also with <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of <S%H7892>music<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, which <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> had <S%H6213>made<s%> to give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, (for his <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> endureth for <S%H5769>ever<s%>,) when <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1984>praised<s%> by their <S%H3027>ministry<s%>: and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> sounded <S%H2690>trumpets<s%> before <S%H3478>them<s%>; and all Israel <S%H5975>stood<s%>.

Moreover <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H6942>hallowed<s%> the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> that was <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; for there he <S%H6213>offered<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt-offerings<s%>, and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of the <S%H5930>peace-offerings<s%>, because the <S%H5178>brazen<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%> which <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> had <S%H6213>made<s%> was not <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H3557>receive<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>, and the <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%>, and the <S%H2459>fat<s%>.

So <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H6213>held<s%> the <S%H2282>feast<s%> at that <S%H6256>time<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with <S%H3966>him<s%>, a very <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6951>assembly<s%>, from the <S%H935>entrance<s%> of <S%H2574>Hamath<s%> unto the <S%H5158>brook<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

And on the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> they <S%H6213>held<s%> a solemn <S%H6116>assembly<s%>: for they <S%H6213>kept<s%> the <S%H2598>dedication<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, and the <S%H2282>feast<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>.

And on the <S%H7969>three<s%> and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> he <S%H7971>sent<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>away<s%> unto their <S%H168>tents<s%>, <S%H2896>joyful<s%> and <S%H8056>glad<s%> of <S%H3820>heart<s%> for the <S%H2896>goodness<s%> that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> had <S%H6213>showed<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%>, and to <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>, and to <S%H3478>Israel<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%>.

Thus <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H3615>finished<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>: and all that <S%H935>came<s%> into <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>'s <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H6213>make<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and in his own <S%H1004>house<s%>, he prosperously <S%H6743>effected<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> by <S%H3915>night<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H8085>him<s%>, I have heard thy <S%H8605>prayer<s%>, and have <S%H977>chosen<s%> this <S%H4725>place<s%> to myself for a <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%>.

If <S%H2005><s%> I shut <S%H6113>up<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> so that there is no <S%H4306>rain<s%>, or if I <S%H6680>command<s%> the <S%H2284>locust<s%> to <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>, or if I <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> among my <S%H5971>people<s%>;

if my <S%H5971>people<s%>, who are <S%H7121>called<s%> by my <S%H8034>name<s%>, shall <S%H3665>humble<s%> <S%H6419>themselves<s%>, and pray, and <S%H1245>seek<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%>, and <S%H7725>turn<s%> from their <S%H7451>wicked<s%> <S%H1870>ways<s%>; then will I <S%H8085>hear<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and will <S%H5545>forgive<s%> their <S%H2403>sin<s%>, and will <S%H7495>heal<s%> their <S%H776>land<s%>.
Now mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall be <S%H6605>open<s%>, and mine <S%H241>ears<s%> <S%H7183>attent<s%>, unto the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> that is made in this <S%H4725>place<s%>.

For now have I <S%H977>chosen<s%> and <S%H6942>hallowed<s%> this <S%H1004>house<s%>, that my <S%H8034>name<s%> may be there <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>; and mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and my <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall be there <S%H3117>perpetually<s%>.

And as for <S%H3212>thee<s%>, if thou wilt walk <S%H6440>before<s%> me as <S%H1732>David<s%> thy <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H1980>walked<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> according to all that I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H8104>thee<s%>, and wilt keep my <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and mine <S%H4941>ordinances<s%>;

then I will <S%H6965>establish<s%> the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of thy <S%H4438>kingdom<s%>, according as I <S%H3772>covenanted<s%> with <S%H1732>David<s%> thy <S%H1>father<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, There shall not <S%H3772>fail<s%> thee a <S%H376>man<s%> to be <S%H4910>ruler<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

But if ye turn <S%H7725>away<s%>, and <S%H5800>forsake<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes<s%> and my <S%H4687>commandments<s%> which I have <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H1980>you<s%>, and shall go and <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, and worship <S%H7812>them<s%>;

then will I pluck them up by the <S%H5428>roots<s%> out of my <S%H127>land<s%> which I have <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H1004>them<s%>; and this house, which I have <S%H6942>hallowed<s%> for my <S%H8034>name<s%>, will I cast <S%H7993>out<s%> of my <S%H6440>sight<s%>, and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> it a <S%H4912>proverb<s%> and a <S%H8148>byword<s%> among all <S%H5971>peoples<s%>.

And this <S%H1004>house<s%>, which is so <S%H5945>high<s%>, every one that <S%H5674>passeth<s%> by it shall be <S%H8074>astonished<s%>, and shall <S%H559>say<s%>, Why hath <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6213>done<s%> thus unto this <S%H776>land<s%>, and to this <S%H1004>house<s%>?

And they shall <S%H559>answer<s%>, Because they <S%H5800>forsook<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, who brought them <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and laid <S%H2388>hold<s%> on <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, and <S%H7812>worshipped<s%> <S%H5647>them<s%>, and served <S%H935>them<s%>: therefore hath he brought all this evil upon <S%H7451>them<s%>.
